value:
The war with Hoshido took many
sacrifices, but...I truly believe we
have achieved a lasting peace.

Together, we of the Nohrian royal
family will create a grand new era.
The kind people will sing songs of.

I may not look it, but I am no stranger
to war. So, please, let me assist you
in battle, $Nu.

Hinoka will be Hoshido's next queen.
She's been so kind to me...despite
having every reason to detest me.

This cape sometimes gets tangled
up in my leg armor... Never you mind
though. I can fix it myself, thanks.

I brought you a gift from your
friend $Nf.$k$pYou are $Nu, yes?

I must keep going. No matter the
hardships I face, this is the path
I have chosen!

I'll protect all of you...
That's a promise!
Wh-why? How discouraging...

If this world can put my power
to use, so be it.

I chose a path, and it ended the war.
Sacrifices were made, but we move
on, toward a more glorious future.

I consider myself blessed, but that
wasn't always the case.$k$pThere was something Xander said
at his coronation that stuck with me
ever since...$k$pThe lives Nohr took will be a burden
he bears forever. The blood spilled,
the tears shed, hearts shattered...$k$pI felt like I was sentenced to a cruel,
accursed fate. Losing Ryoma, Takumi,
Azura...the sorrow was crushing.$k$pBut...thanks to the bonds I share with
my friends and my families, we were
able to achieve peace.$k$pNow, that is why I fight. To protect
those bonds, even between others.
And it is why I will fight at your side.
はぁっ！
未来を！
きゃああっ！
負けません…！
This is the path I chose!
There's no turning back!
We'll forge our destinies!
The song doesn't end!
The future...
ふふふ
A...Legendary Hero? If you're looking for a great warrior, I'd suggest one of my siblings instead...
I pledge to be someone who believes in people, and works for their betterment.
I want us to become better friends. Tell me about yourself!
Everyone here is such good friends. How did they get to know one another?
Finally... I can be with my brothers and sisters once again.
This path is the one I chose for myself. I have no regrets.
No one can say what the future holds. But if the two of us are together, nothing can stop us!
Hmm...
Which way to go...
Keep moving forward.
